title: Drawing, Tapestry Design for "Neighborhood"
medium: Graphite on verso of graph paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite beneath drawing in lower right margin:  working drawing/"Neighborhood"/ Tapestry; in left margin divided in four sections with numbers in each:  5/10/15/20 (bottom to top); color notes over right half of drawing.
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Design of overlapping houses with pitched rooves;  rows of bare trees at right edge and receding into distance at upper left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Tapestry Design for "Neighborhood". Graphite on verso of graph paper. 
Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-54
